metadata.description: From the depths of space, the comet Repulse approaches Earth, and with it, a hunger for blood and a banquet of slaughter. The target of the oncoming chaos is Shoko, a high school girl who has no idea what's in store for her. Only Athena, Goddess of War, and her warrior handmaidens stand before the destruction -- but will their power be enough to save Shoko from the resurrection of an ancient evil?
metadata.name: Saint Seiya: Saintia Shō
